content.text: Hi! I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete. What about you?
Hi! I'm a bit of a wanderer myself. I'm proud of the time I traveled the country in my car. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to create houses out of matches. It's my hobby. What do you do for fun?
I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I also run my own cleaning company.
That's cool! I love honey. Do you like to cook?
Yes, I do! I love to make sweet treats. I also own my own music store.
Wow, you're very busy! I'm just a business major, but I love to spend time with my family.
Sounds like you have a good balance. I like to spend time with my family too. What do you like to do with them?
We love to go to the beach and play games. What about you?
We like to go camping and hiking. We also love to travel.
That sounds like fun! I've always wanted to go camping.
You should! It's a great way to get outdoors and enjoy nature.
